name: SensorTower API
description: Enterprise-level mobile app intelligence platform providing app store optimization data, competitive intelligence, market insights, and user acquisition analytics across iOS, Android, and global app stores including China.

access_info.pricing_model: Custom enterprise pricing starting at thousands per month

endpoints.description: Get download estimates for iOS apps by country and date range
endpoints.response_format: JSON with download estimates

endpoints.description: Get revenue estimates for Android apps
endpoints.response_format: JSON with revenue data

endpoints.description: Get keyword rankings for iOS apps
endpoints.response_format: JSON with ranking data

research_notes.api_summary: SensorTower provides enterprise-grade mobile app intelligence with comprehensive data on app performance, market trends, and competitive intelligence. The platform covers iOS App Store, Google Play, and major Chinese app stores with detailed analytics on downloads, revenue, keywords, and user acquisition.

name: Aviation Edge Flight Tracker API
description: Real-time global flight tracking API providing live flight positions, schedules, routes, airline and airport data with coverage of over 10,000 aircraft simultaneously tracked worldwide.

access_info.pricing_model: Freemium - Free tier with 100 calls/month, paid plans from $7-$2000/month

endpoints.description: Get real-time flight tracking data for all flights or specific aircraft
endpoints.response_format: JSON array with flight positions and status

endpoints.description: Access airline schedules and flight timetables
endpoints.response_format: JSON with scheduled flights

endpoints.description: Get airline route information between airports
endpoints.response_format: JSON with route details

research_notes.api_summary: Aviation Edge provides comprehensive aviation data APIs including real-time flight tracking, schedules, routes, and static aviation data. The platform tracks over 10,000 aircraft simultaneously with global coverage and offers both real-time and historical flight information.

name: FlightAware AeroAPI
description: Enterprise-grade flight tracking API offering real-time, historical, and predictive flight data with global coverage, machine learning-powered predictions, and comprehensive aviation intelligence.

access_info.pricing_model: Query-based pricing starting at $0.002 per query with monthly minimums

endpoints.description: Get flight information by flight identifier with real-time positions
endpoints.response_format: JSON with detailed flight data

endpoints.description: Search flights using advanced query syntax
endpoints.response_format: JSON array of matching flights

endpoints.description: Get arrivals and departures for an airport
endpoints.response_format: JSON with airport flight activity

research_notes.api_summary: FlightAware AeroAPI is an enterprise-grade aviation data platform providing real-time flight tracking, historical data since 2011, and machine learning-powered predictive analytics through Foresight. The API offers comprehensive coverage with data from ADS-B, radar, datalink, and other sources.

name: AIS (Automatic Identification System) APIs
description: Maritime vessel tracking APIs providing real-time and historical ship positions, port calls, vessel details, and voyage information through the global Automatic Identification System network.

access_info.pricing_model: Varies by provider - Free tiers available, enterprise pricing from $100-10000/month

endpoints.description: Get real-time vessel positions and voyage information
endpoints.response_format: JSON/XML/CSV with vessel data

endpoints.description: Retrieve vessel port call history and ETAs
endpoints.response_format: JSON with port call records

endpoints.description: Get vessel route history and predictions
endpoints.response_format: JSON with route waypoints

research_notes.api_summary: AIS APIs provide access to the global maritime vessel tracking network. Multiple providers offer varying levels of coverage, features, and pricing. Common capabilities include real-time positions, historical tracks, port calls, and vessel details. Providers include MarineTraffic (largest), VesselFinder, AISHub (free tier), and specialized services.

name: MarineTraffic API Services
description: World's largest AIS network providing comprehensive maritime intelligence including real-time vessel tracking, predictive analytics, port congestion data, and fleet management through APIs covering 180,000+ vessels daily.

access_info.pricing_model: Credit-based subscriptions from $170/month to enterprise
access_info.rate_limits: Based on subscription tier and credits

endpoints.description: Real-time vessel positions with 2-minute satellite updates
endpoints.response_format: JSON/XML/CSV with vessel positions

endpoints.description: Predictive vessel arrivals with ML-powered ETAs
endpoints.response_format: JSON with predicted arrivals

endpoints.description: Port congestion metrics and wait times
endpoints.response_format: JSON with congestion analytics

research_notes.api_summary: MarineTraffic operates the world's largest AIS vessel tracking network, now part of Kpler's maritime intelligence platform. The API services provide comprehensive vessel tracking, predictive analytics, port intelligence, and fleet management capabilities with coverage of 180,000+ vessels and integration with satellite AIS for global coverage.

name: Spire Maritime API
description: Satellite-based vessel tracking providing global AIS data, vessel positions, port events, and maritime analytics through GraphQL and REST APIs with real-time satellite coverage.

access_info.pricing_model: Free trial available, custom enterprise pricing based on data needs
access_info.rate_limits: Varies by plan, custom based on subscription

endpoints.description: Main GraphQL endpoint for vessel tracking, port events, and maritime data queries
endpoints.response_format: GraphQL JSON response with requested fields

endpoints.description: REST API for retrieving raw AIS messages (NMEA or decoded) with time-based filtering
endpoints.response_format: JSON array of AIS messages

research_notes.api_summary: Spire Maritime provides satellite-based vessel tracking with global AIS data coverage, port events, and maritime analytics through GraphQL and REST APIs. The platform offers real-time satellite updates and comprehensive maritime intelligence.

name: Windward Maritime Intelligence API
description: AI-powered maritime risk and intelligence platform providing vessel behavior analytics, sanctions screening, and predictive insights for maritime domain awareness.

access_info.pricing_model: Tiered pricing from API Insights Lab to Enterprise with custom solutions
access_info.rate_limits: Varies by tier, concurrent requests based on subscription

endpoints.description: Search vessels by various criteria including name, IMO, MMSI with risk insights
endpoints.response_format: JSON with vessel details and risk scores

endpoints.description: Get comprehensive risk assessment for specific vessels
endpoints.response_format: JSON risk assessment report

endpoints.description: Ocean freight visibility with ETA predictions and delay risks
endpoints.response_format: JSON with shipment status and predictions

research_notes.api_summary: Windward provides AI-powered maritime risk intelligence with vessel behavior analytics, sanctions screening, and predictive insights. The platform offers dark activity detection, ownership investigation, and real-time compliance alerts for maritime domain awareness.

name: Panjiva Global Trade API
description: Comprehensive global trade data platform providing import/export records, supply chain intelligence, and company relationships from 30+ countries with data back to 2007.

access_info.pricing_model: Tiered from Basic (1,000 calls/month) to Enterprise (unlimited)
access_info.rate_limits: 10 requests/second, monthly quota varies by plan

endpoints.description: Search global shipment records by company, product, or trade lane
endpoints.response_format: JSON with shipment records and metadata

endpoints.description: Get detailed company profile including trade activity and relationships
endpoints.response_format: JSON company profile with trade data

endpoints.description: Analyze trade trends for products, companies, or trade lanes
endpoints.response_format: JSON with time series trend data

content_summary.geographic_scope: 30+ countries including US, China, India, EU

research_notes.api_summary: Panjiva, part of S&P Global, provides comprehensive global trade data covering 30+ countries with historical data back to 2007. The platform offers import/export records, supply chain intelligence, and company relationships through REST APIs with JSON and CSV formats.

name: Import Genius Trade Intelligence API
description: US-focused trade intelligence platform providing detailed import/export records, competitive analysis, and supplier discovery tools with mobile app access.

access_info.pricing_model: Essential $149/month, Professional $299/month, Enterprise custom pricing
access_info.rate_limits: 60 requests/minute, daily quota varies by plan

endpoints.description: Search import/export records by company, product, HS code, or keywords
endpoints.response_format: JSON with shipment records

endpoints.description: Retrieve detailed company profile with trade history
endpoints.response_format: JSON company profile data

endpoints.description: Create monitoring alerts for companies or products
endpoints.response_format: JSON monitor configuration

research_notes.api_summary: Import Genius specializes in US trade intelligence with detailed import/export records, competitive analysis, and supplier discovery. The platform offers 12 months of rolling US import data and 5 years of export data with mobile app access.

name: Enigma Public Data API
description: Comprehensive US business data platform providing enriched company profiles, financial health indicators, and public records intelligence via GraphQL and REST APIs.

access_info.pricing_model: Developer (limited), Growth (production), Enterprise (unlimited)
access_info.rate_limits: Match: 50 req/sec, ID: 200 req/sec, latency: Match 609ms, ID 47ms

endpoints.description: Main GraphQL endpoint for flexible data queries on US businesses
endpoints.response_format: GraphQL JSON response

endpoints.description: Match and identify business profiles based on name, address, or other attributes
endpoints.response_format: JSON with matched business profiles and confidence scores

endpoints.description: Retrieve detailed business attributes and enriched data for a specific Enigma ID
endpoints.response_format: JSON with comprehensive business data

research_notes.api_summary: Enigma Public provides comprehensive US business data through GraphQL and REST APIs, offering enriched company profiles, financial health indicators, and public records intelligence with high-performance endpoints and KYB compliance capabilities.

name: Dun & Bradstreet D&B Direct+ API
description: Comprehensive business intelligence platform providing company data, risk assessments, and analytics for due diligence, credit decisions, and business development. Covers 430+ million companies globally with real-time data enrichment.

access_info.pricing_model: Subscription-based with usage tiers - contact sales for custom pricing
access_info.rate_limits: Varies by subscription tier, typically 1000+ requests per day

endpoints.description: Obtain OAuth bearer token for API authentication
endpoints.response_format: JSON with access_token and expires_in

endpoints.description: Retrieve comprehensive company data by DUNS number
endpoints.response_format: JSON with detailed company profile and financial data

endpoints.description: Search for companies using various criteria
endpoints.response_format: JSON with array of matching companies

content_summary.update_frequency: Real-time to daily updates depending on data type

research_notes.api_summary: D&B Direct+ provides comprehensive business intelligence with company data, risk assessments, and analytics covering 430+ million companies globally. Features OAuth authentication, multiple data products, and real-time enrichment capabilities for due diligence and credit decisions.

name: RavenPack Analytics API
description: Advanced news analytics and sentiment analysis platform processing 40,000+ news sources in real-time. Provides structured analytics, sentiment scoring, and event detection for financial markets with 20+ years of historical data.

access_info.pricing_model: Custom pricing based on data volume - Enterprise licenses start at $50K+ annually
access_info.rate_limits: JSON endpoint: 10,000 records for granular datasets, 500 entities for indicator datasets

endpoints.description: List available datasets and their configurations
endpoints.response_format: JSON array of dataset objects with metadata

endpoints.description: Real-time JSON endpoint for small data requests
endpoints.response_format: JSON with analytics records array

endpoints.description: Real-time streaming analytics feed
endpoints.response_format: Streaming JSON analytics records

research_notes.api_summary: RavenPack processes 40,000+ news sources in real-time providing structured analytics, sentiment scoring, and event detection for financial markets. Features 20+ years of historical data, streaming capabilities, and Python/R client libraries for algorithmic trading and risk management.

name: Alexandria Technology NLP API
description: AI-powered Natural Language Processing platform specializing in financial text analysis. Provides sentiment analysis, entity recognition, and thematic insights from earnings calls, news, and social media with proven alpha generation capabilities.

access_info.pricing_model: Custom pricing based on data requirements and usage volume

endpoints.description: Access earnings call sentiment and thematic analysis
endpoints.response_format: JSON with sentiment scores and thematic breakdowns

endpoints.description: Company news sentiment analysis from premium publishers
endpoints.response_format: JSON with news sentiment metrics and article metadata

endpoints.description: ESG-focused sentiment analysis from news and reports
endpoints.response_format: JSON with ESG sentiment scores by category

content_summary.geographic_scope: Global coverage for all publicly traded companies
content_summary.update_frequency: Real-time to 1-hour delays depending on data source

research_notes.api_summary: Alexandria Technology provides AI-powered NLP for financial text analysis with proven alpha generation capabilities. Specializes in earnings call sentiment, news analytics, and ESG analysis with real-time processing and global coverage.

documentation.api_reference: Full API reference available to subscribers
documentation.examples: Python and R code examples provided

name: Amenity Analytics NLP API
description: Enterprise-grade NLP platform for financial text analysis with >90% accuracy. Extracts insights from earnings calls, SEC filings, news, and internal documents. Specializes in deception detection, ESG analysis, and custom financial event taxonomies.

access_info.pricing_model: Custom pricing - AWS Marketplace options available starting from enterprise tiers ($500K+ solutions)
access_info.rate_limits: Varies by subscription and deployment type

endpoints.description: Fundamental analysis insights from financial documents
endpoints.response_format: JSON with fundamental event insights and sentiment

endpoints.description: Analyze earnings calls for deceptive language patterns
endpoints.response_format: JSON with deception scores and analysis

endpoints.description: ESG sentiment analysis with UN SDG framework
endpoints.response_format: JSON with ESG sentiment scores and materiality assessments

content_summary.update_frequency: Real-time to daily depending on data source and deployment

research_notes.api_summary: Amenity Analytics provides enterprise-grade NLP with >90% accuracy for financial text analysis. Specializes in deception detection, ESG analysis, and custom financial event taxonomies with AWS Marketplace availability and SOC 2 compliance.

documentation.api_reference: Complete API reference available to subscribers

name: Social Market Analytics API
description: Licensed Twitter partner providing social media sentiment analysis for financial markets. Aggregates professional investor sentiment from Twitter and social platforms with 9+ years of historical data and proven predictive capabilities.

access_info.pricing_model: Custom pricing based on data volume and real-time requirements

endpoints.description: Search social sentiment data with filtering options
endpoints.response_format: JSON/XML with sentiment scores and social metrics

endpoints.description: Real-time streaming sentiment data
endpoints.response_format: Streaming JSON with real-time sentiment updates

endpoints.description: Historical sentiment data replay
endpoints.response_format: JSON with historical sentiment time series

content_summary.geographic_scope: Global social media coverage with focus on English-language content

research_notes.api_summary: Social Market Analytics is a licensed Twitter partner providing social media sentiment analysis for financial markets. Features 9+ years of historical data, real-time streaming, and specialized focus on professional investor sentiment with proven predictive capabilities.

name: StockTwits API
description: Social platform for financial discussions and sentiment from retail investors. Provides access to real-time social sentiment, user streams, watchlists, and trending symbols discussions. Currently not accepting new API registrations.

access_info.pricing_model: Not publicly available - contact for pricing. Previously had free tier but suspended

endpoints.description: Get user stream messages
endpoints.response_format: JSON with messages array

endpoints.description: Get symbol stream messages
endpoints.response_format: JSON with messages and cursor data

endpoints.description: Get trending symbols and discussions
endpoints.response_format: JSON with trending symbols array

research_notes.api_summary: StockTwits provides social communications platform for financial markets but has suspended new API registrations as of 2024 while reviewing their API offerings. The platform remains popular for retail investor sentiment but API access is currently limited.

name: iSentium Social Sentiment API
description: AI-powered social sentiment analysis for financial markets using patented NLP technology. Provides Daily Directional Indicators covering ~90% of U.S. stock market liquidity, supporting over 8,500 U.S. stocks, indices, and ETFs.

access_info.pricing_model: Custom enterprise pricing based on data volume and requirements

endpoints.description: Daily Directional Indicators for supported securities
endpoints.response_format: JSON with sentiment scores and directional indicators

endpoints.description: Real-time sentiment feed for securities
endpoints.response_format: Streaming JSON with real-time sentiment updates

endpoints.description: Social media buzz volume metrics
endpoints.response_format: JSON with buzz volume and change metrics

research_notes.api_summary: iSentium provides enterprise-only social sentiment analysis with patented NLP technology. Covers 90% of U.S. stock market liquidity and is vetted by JP Morgan and NASDAQ. Requires direct business relationship and custom pricing negotiations.

name: Dataminr Event Detection API
description: AI-powered real-time event and risk detection platform analyzing public data sources. Processes billions of public data inputs per day from nearly 1 million distinct sources including text, images, video, and sound in 150+ languages.

access_info.pricing_model: Custom enterprise pricing based on use case and volume

endpoints.description: Retrieve real-time alerts based on configured parameters
endpoints.response_format: JSON with alert objects containing event details

endpoints.description: Real-time streaming alerts endpoint
endpoints.response_format: Streaming JSON with real-time alert data

endpoints.description: Get detailed information about a specific event
endpoints.response_format: JSON with comprehensive event details and related information

research_notes.api_summary: Dataminr is a premium enterprise platform used by major corporations, government agencies, and newsrooms. Known for speed in detecting events before traditional news sources. Requires enterprise licensing agreements with dedicated support.

name: SESAMm TextReveal API
description: AI-powered ESG and sentiment analysis from textual data using cutting-edge NLP. Covers public and private companies assessing ESG risks in over 100 languages from 20 billion historical articles with 90 ESG risk categories aligned with UN standards.

access_info.pricing_model: Custom enterprise pricing based on coverage and data volume requirements

endpoints.description: ESG controversy alerts and monitoring
endpoints.response_format: JSON with ESG alerts and source articles

endpoints.description: Comprehensive ESG profile for specific company
endpoints.response_format: JSON with ESG scores, risk categories, and source transparency

endpoints.description: UN Sustainable Development Goals positive impact tracking
endpoints.response_format: JSON with SDG impact scores and supporting evidence

research_notes.api_summary: SESAMm specializes in ESG and alternative data analytics with transparent ESG analysis and source traceability. Focuses on private equity, asset management, and enterprise use cases with UN Global Compact alignment.

name: Accern Financial Analytics API
description: No-code generative NLP platform for financial news analytics and sentiment analysis. AI-powered financial news analytics, sentiment analysis, and event detection using adaptive NLP technology used by major financial institutions.

access_info.pricing_model: Multiple tiers based on data volume and features - trial available with limited requests

endpoints.description: Access AI-generated alpha signals and financial insights
endpoints.response_format: JSON with alpha signals, sentiment scores, and entity information

endpoints.description: Structured financial news with AI-extracted entities and events
endpoints.response_format: JSON with news articles, extracted entities, and event classifications

endpoints.description: Real-time sentiment analysis for financial entities
endpoints.response_format: JSON with sentiment scores and impact assessments

research_notes.api_summary: Accern offers accessible financial NLP with no-code platform making it easier for developers to implement sophisticated financial analytics. Strong backing from major investors with proven use cases at large financial institutions. Good balance between enterprise features and developer accessibility.

name: Thinknum Alternative Data API
description: Web scraping intelligence platform providing alternative data insights through comprehensive tracking of company metrics, consumer behavior, and market trends via automated data collection from public web sources.

access_info.pricing_model: Enterprise-only with custom pricing - contact sales for access

endpoints.description: Obtain authentication token using client credentials
endpoints.response_format: JSON with access token and expiration

endpoints.description: List available datasets and their metadata
endpoints.response_format: JSON array of available datasets

endpoints.description: Retrieve data for specific dataset with filtering options
endpoints.response_format: JSON/CSV with requested dataset information

content_summary.geographic_scope: Global with focus on publicly traded companies
content_summary.update_frequency: Daily updates with real-time web scraping

research_notes.api_summary: Thinknum provides alternative data through web scraping intelligence with comprehensive tracking of company metrics and consumer behavior. Features well-documented REST API with authentication, dataset management, and flexible data retrieval options.

name: Eagle Alpha Data Marketplace
description: Alternative data marketplace platform providing access to 1,850+ dataset profiles from various vendors. Functions as data discovery and vendor connection service rather than direct API provider.

access_info.pricing_model: Marketplace model - pricing varies by individual data vendor

endpoints.description: Browse available datasets and vendor profiles
endpoints.response_format: Web platform interface with dataset listings

content_summary.geographic_scope: Global dataset coverage through various vendors
content_summary.update_frequency: Platform updated continuously with new vendor additions

research_notes.api_summary: Eagle Alpha operates as a marketplace aggregator connecting clients with alternative data vendors rather than providing direct APIs. The platform helps discover and evaluate alternative data sources from 1,850+ dataset profiles.

name: Nasdaq Data Link API (formerly Quandl)
description: Comprehensive financial and economic data platform providing access to millions of datasets through REST API and streaming services. Offers both free public datasets and premium alternative data sources.

access_info.pricing_model: Freemium - free datasets available, premium subscriptions for alternative data

endpoints.description: Retrieve specific dataset with time series data
endpoints.response_format: JSON/CSV with time series data and metadata

endpoints.description: Search and browse available datasets
endpoints.response_format: JSON with dataset search results

endpoints.description: List available databases and their metadata
endpoints.response_format: JSON with database listings and descriptions

content_summary.geographic_scope: Global coverage with extensive US focus
content_summary.update_frequency: Varies by dataset - real-time to quarterly updates

research_notes.api_summary: Nasdaq Data Link (formerly Quandl) provides comprehensive access to millions of financial and economic datasets through well-documented REST API. Offers freemium model with both free public data and premium alternative data sources.

name: 7Park Data Consumer Analytics API
description: Consumer behavior analytics platform providing transaction data, app engagement metrics, and web activity insights for investment research and business intelligence. Enterprise-only access with custom APIs.

access_info.pricing_model: Enterprise-only with custom pricing based on data requirements

endpoints.description: Web activity and traffic analytics for companies and sectors
endpoints.response_format: JSON with web activity metrics and trends

endpoints.description: Consumer transaction data and spending patterns
endpoints.response_format: JSON with transaction volumes and consumer behavior

endpoints.description: Mobile app usage and engagement analytics
endpoints.response_format: JSON with app usage statistics and engagement metrics

content_summary.geographic_scope: United States with selective international coverage
content_summary.update_frequency: Daily updates with some real-time components

research_notes.api_summary: 7Park Data specializes in consumer behavior analytics with enterprise-only access. Provides transaction data, app engagement metrics, and web activity insights for investment research. API documentation endpoints were inaccessible during research.

name: Alpha Hat Investment Research API (Discontinued)
description: Former investment research automation platform that accelerated analysis workflows. Acquired by Earnest Research in January 2020 and technology integrated into parent company's platform.

access_info.pricing_model: Service discontinued - technology integrated into Earnest Research

endpoints.description: Historical endpoint for investment research automation
endpoints.response_format: Service discontinued

content_summary.geographic_scope: Historical service scope no longer available

research_notes.api_summary: Alpha Hat was acquired by Earnest Research in January 2020. The investment research automation technology has been integrated into Earnest Research's platform and is no longer available as a standalone API service.
